metadata.name: Stanford Rare Word (RW) Similarity Dataset
metadata.authors: Minh-Thang Luong, Richard Socher, and Christopher D. Manning.

papers.title: Better Word Representations with Recursive Neural Networks for Morphology

metadata.description: The dataset (rw.txt) consists of 2034 pairs, one per line. Each line consists of a pair of words, the average similarity rating and up to 10 individual ratings. Tokens are tab-delimited.
